price: Thus We showed Abraham the dominion of the heavens and earth so that he would be of those who have certain faith.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُرِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ مَلَكُوتَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِيَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُوقِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
